Ghost Party

Ghost Party is a game made for the Halifax Game Collective Pageant theme 'Ghost Stories'. It is about exploring the unknown in a familiar setting. It presents conversation and communication in a novel and sometimes humorous way. Experience gratification for friends, uncomfortable silences with strangers and breeze through awkward small talk with the aid of your ghostly super power. It's still in development, but I am very excited to continue working on it.
